text: Chele (chilamusichi) chiwele chakuwandichila (kusitendekasya mboni) kuti siyiche nao umboni mwaukusosekwela, kapena kuti sijogope yanti kutakwika mwakupelechedwe kulumbila (kwine) panyuma pa kulumbila kwao (ni kwaluka), soni mun'jogopani Allah ni kupikanila (malamusi), soni Allah jwangaajongola wandu wakunyosya
